DOC.brief_summary: Cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) important public health problem affect million people worldwide . Associations risk factor , smoking , dyslipidaemia hypertension , prevalent CVD well document . However , study investigate association onset disease . The initial manifestation CVD , example episode unstable angina , important influence prognosis , quality life management disease . Furthermore , extent social deprivation , alcohol consumption atrial fibrillation affect presentation CVD poorly understand deserves consideration . Most previous study consider CVD single entity . However , difference aetiology coronary phenotype suggest risk factor may share across specific coronary phenotype relative importance likely differ phenotype . Gaining knowledge difference could provide insight pathophysiology specific form CVD could eventually lead modification recommendation patient management disease prevention . We propose use linkage national registry coronary event general practice record Clinical Practice Research Database ( CPRD ) , investigate whether demographic , behavioral , clinico-metabolic risk factor differentially influence onset specific type CVD .
